Boston, MA --- Quanterix

Quanterix is looking for an engineer with experience writing scientific software analyzing fluorescence images.

Key Responsibilities:

- Prioritize, create, and own features for our single molecule diagnostics product.

- Work with terabytes of microscopy image data.

- Design new kinds of analytics to provide valuable insight into data that we acquire.

Desired Skills & Experience

- 5+ years of experience developing readable, fast-performing code using C# and .NET technology

- Experience developing algorithms to efficiently process large data.

- Self-starting, detail-oriented developer with good teamwork and communication skills.

- Previous work with fluorescence imaging, microscopy data or scientific computing is a plus.

- Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodology is a plus.

- Mathematical background is a big plus.

- Experience with ImageJ is a plus.

More info at http://quanterix.com/about/careers/item/193-e-110-software-e...
